name: Boundless Network
description: "Burrito Wallet is a non-custodial Web3 wallet designed for next-generation user engagement and partner integration. The wallet provides seamless access to on-chain campaigns, DeFi services, and third-party token onboarding, serving as a comprehensive gateway for both users and projects across emerging markets. At the core of the ecosystem is $BUN, Burrito Walletâ€™s native utility token. $BUN powers key platform functions including campaign participation and rewards, governance voting, in-app incentives, and partner activations."
